290806.「この 並々ならぬ破邪舟師のチカラは……。\n <pc>さま。\n こちらの お:
I feel a power of an extraordinary
Ship Shaper... Hey, <pc>.
Who is this guy?

290807.「ええっ！？ この お方が\n 伝説の破邪舟師 父祖エルジュ……\n 私の 遠い:
Wha?! You're sayin' this is the legendary
Erju?! He's my ancestor dat goes way,
way back...

290808.「本来…なら ボクが 行くべき……\n な…のに……。すまない……。:
It should... be me who's going, but... I...
I'm sorry...

290810.「……あ…の レイダメテス……\n 邪悪な…オーラを 見た…だろ……。\n 以前:
That... Reidametes... I feel a... sinister
aura... It's nothing like... it once was...

290812.「……ありがとうございます エルジュさま。\n どうか ここで 待っていてくださ:
Thanks a ton, Erju. Please wait here for a
bit.

290814.「いかがです？ エルジュさま。\n なかなかモダンな\n おもむきで ございまし:
Well, whaddya think, Erju? It's got quite da
modern look, don't it?

290815.「うん。なかなか…いいね……。\n さぁ <pc>……\n レイダメテスへ……！:
Yeah... it's pretty good...
<pc>... you must go to Reidametes!

290817.「……申し訳ございません。\n 私のチカラが 足りないばかりに。:
I'm really sorry... Seems like my power just
ain't enough.

290818.「いや……あれほどのチカラを得た\n レイダメテスには ただの 破邪舟では\n:
No... it seems a mere Sacred Ship is no match
for Reidametes current power...

290819.「だが 何か方法は あるはずだ。\n でなければ この世界は……！:
But we have to find a way. If we don't, then
this world will....

290821.「幼い頃 我が師から 聞いたことがあります。\n 破邪舟を強化する秘術について\:
When I was little, my master told me
somethin'. He said he talked with an alchemist
about a technique to power up da Sacred Ship.

290822.「……破邪舟を 強化する秘術だと！\n それは どんな術なんだっ！？:
A technique to power up the Sacred Ship?!
What is this technique?!

290823.「そ その……\n まだ 幼い頃でしたので くわしくは……。\n 我が師なら 覚:
W-well... I was pretty young, so I don't
remember much... my master would probably
remember, though.

290824.「我が師であり 私の 祖母でもある\n 先代の破邪舟師 ハルッカは\n ウェナ諸:
My master and grandma Haruka was a former
Sacred Sailor... she lives in Verinard
Kingdom...

290826.「……ヴェリナード王国の\n ヴェリナード城下町に 住んでいます。\n 祖母を:
She lives in Verinard Castle Town. Please go
and see her, won't ya?

290827.「それにしても 父祖エルジュさまは\n どこか お身体でも悪いのでしょうか。:
Still... it seems like there's still somethin'
wrong with Erju...

290828.「たしか エルジュさまは 若くして\n 不治の病で 命を落とされたとか……。\n:
I heard dat Erju died at a young age due to
some incurable disease... I'm pretty worried.

290829.「<pc>さま。\n どうか あの方を お願いいたします。:
Please take care of him, won't you,
<pc>?

290830.「……なんだい。\n 今日は 千客万来だねえ。:
What is it now...? Quite a lot of visitors
today...

290831.「破邪舟師 ハルッカの家は ここか！？\n ハルッカ お前に 頼みがある！:
Is this where the Ship Shaper Haruka lives?!
Haruka, I have a favor I must ask of you!

290832.「人の家に あいさつもナシに入ってきて\n おふくろを 呼び捨てかよ。\n アン:
You just barge into our house and then demand
my mother do something for you? Who the hell
do you think you are?

290833.「……失礼。ボクは 破邪舟師エルジュ。\n そこにいる <pc>と ともに\n:
Excuse me... I am the Ship Shaper Erju. I came
here with <pc>, as we are trying
to defeat Netherlord Nergel.

290834.「お前は フルッカの師なんだろう。\n ボクたちに チカラを 貸してほしい。\n:
You're Fluka's master, aren't you? We really
need your help. Please teach me the technique
to strengthen the Sacred Ship!

290835.「……なるほど その とてつもないチカラ。\n 我等の父祖 伝説の破邪舟師エルジ:
I see... what a tremendous power. You must no
doubt be the legendary Ship Shaper
Erju himself.

290836.「だが……その術は\n 大昔に 失われちまったのさ。:
However... that technique was lost a very
long time ago.

290838.「あれは アタシが 新婚ホヤホヤの頃さ。\n とある錬金術師の協力を得て アタシ:
It was around the time I got married. With an
alchemist's help, I devised a secret technique
to bolster the Sacred Ship.

290839.「あの ヒゲオヤジ。見た目によらず\n たいしたウデ前でね。ヤツのレシピが\n:
That scruffy old man... despite his looks,
he's quite skillful. His recipe gave the
Sacred Ship new powers.

290840.「ただ ちょうど 同じ頃に\n コイツを身ごもったもんだから\n しばらく それ:
However, since I was pregnant with him around
the same time, I didn't have too much time
for that.

290841.「ようやく 子どもの手が離れて\n 錬金術師を たずねたところ\n 取り返しのつ:
Once caring for my child was in order, I
visited that alchemist again... however, the
situation had become dire.

290843.「アイツの家を 何者かが 襲ったらしくてね。\n 家の中は めちゃくちゃ。\n:
Someone had attacked his house and burned
everything to the ground. All of the recipes
sadly went with it.

290844.「錬金術師本人も 大怪我を負って 意識不明。\n その上 娘の話によれば それ以:
That alchemist was badly hurt and knocked unconscious. Besides, according to his daughter, he'd lost his alchemical ability
even before that.

290845.「……たとえ 怪我が治ったって\n 錬金術師のチカラが 戻らない以上\n どうに:
Even though he recovered, if he has no
alchemical ability left... there's nothing
he'd be able to do.

290846.「破邪舟のレシピの件は それっきり\n 忘れるしかなかったのさ……。:
I never saw that recipe again, so I eventually
just forgot all about it...

290847.「……その ６０年前が カギのようだな。: 60 years ago seems to be the key...

290848.「出発前に 師から教わった あの術を\n 試してみるべきかもしれない……。:
Perhaps I should try that technique my master
taught me before I came here...

290849.「<pc>。\n 君の 時渡りのチカラと\n ボクの破邪舟で ６０年前に 行こう:
<pc>. Let's go back in time 60
years with your time traveling power and
my Sacred Ship.

290850.「と…時渡りっ！？\n 破邪舟に そんなことが できるのかい！:
T...time travel?! The Sacred Ship can truly
do such a thing?

290851.「……我が師によれば 強き絆で結ばれた\n 時渡りの使い手と 破邪舟師ならば ご:
According to my master, if there is a strong bond between a time traveler and a Ship Shaper, it is possible to time travel in a
Sacred Ship for a brief period of time.

290852.「その 錬金術師が 大怪我をする前……\n ６０年前に 時渡りすれば\n 破邪舟:
If we travel back in time 60 years to the
point right before that alchemist is
injured... I'm sure we can get that recipe.

290853.「ハルッカ……その錬金術師が\n 住んでいたのは どこなんだ？:
Haruka... can you tell me where that alchemist
used to live?

290854.「あ…ああ！\n ナルビアの町さ！ 錬金術師イッショウは\n ひとり娘と ナルビ:
Ah! That's right! It was Nalbia Town! That
alchemist Issho lived there with his only
daughter!

290856.「さあ！ ボクの真似をして。\n 君の 時渡りのチカラを……！:
Now! Follow my lead. Show me your power of
time travel!

290857.「こんなことが 破邪舟に\n 可能だなんて……！？:
To think this was possible with the Sacred
Ship...!

290858.「……行こう！\n ６０年前の ナルビアの町へ！: Let's go! To Nalbia Town, 60 years ago!

290860.「悪い芽は 早めに 摘んでおくのが\n ラズバーン様の やりかたでね……。\n:
General Razburn's orders! We have to nip
anything bad in the bud... That means you
and your recipes are history!

290861.「……お前の主は ラズバーンか。\n この 錬金術師の研究が\n よほど 邪魔だ:
So your master is Razburn... it looks like
this alchemy research was a pretty big
nuisance to him.

290862.「あっひゃっひゃっひゃっひゃ！ そうともよォ！\n 俺ァ ラズバーン様の 子分よ:
Ehehehehehe! That's right! I'm one of
Razburn's loyal servants!

290863.「俺らの王の復活の 妨げになるモンは\n ひとつ残らず 消しちまうのが\n 俺の:
It is my duty to destroy anything that would
get in the way of the resurrection of our
great master!

290864.「ふぅーっ 助かったぜ……。\n ところで お前らは 何者なんだ？:
Whew... you saved me...
Who are you guys, anyway?

290867.「ただいま！ お父さん。\n あら？ どなたか お客様なの？:
Dad, I'm home!
Huh? Who is this?

290868.「……大変っ！\n とにかく この人を ベッドに！: Oh, no...! Let's get them into bed!

290870.「<pc>には 話したけれど\n ボクは 原因不明の病に冒されている。\n ……:
As I told <pc>, I'm suffering
from an unknown disease. I probably won't
last for much longer...

290871.「けど 世界を救えるなら\n ボクの命なんて どうなってもいい！\n だから 破:
But I don't care what happens to me, as long
as the world is saved! So, about the technique
to strengthen the Sacred Ship...

290872.「お前の病ってえのは 何日も 高熱が続いて\n 身体のチカラが 抜けるんだろ。:
Your illness is a high fever that lasts for
days and leaves your body completely
exhausted, right?

290873.「ここにいる オレの娘 リリオルも\n お前と同じ病気……\n メラゾ熱に かか:
Lyriol here had the same thing happen to her.
It's called Kafrizz Fever.

290874.「同じ症状だから すぐ わかったわ。\n でも <kyodai>って人が 特効薬:
I immediately recognized it since I had the same symptoms as you. But someone named alchemized a remedy for me,
and I'm completely cured!

290875.「今は 用事があって 出かけてるんだけど\n あの人が錬金した メラゾ熱のクスリ:
I'm out running errands now, but I have the
remedy to your fever right here! Go on, drink
up!

290876.「……ウソだろ！？\n 熱も だるさも すっかり消えてる。:
No way... My fever and my fatigue have
completely vanished!

290877.「あったりめぇだ！\n アイツは オレの一番弟子にして\n 世界最高の 錬金名人:
Of course! They're my number one disciple and
the best alchemist in the world!

290878.「……メラゾ熱は 恐ろしい病だ。\n だが この 特効薬のおかげで\n 今後は:
Kafrizz Fever is a horrible illness... but
thanks to that medicine, many people won't
have to suffer from it anymore.

290879.「そうか……。\n ここは ボクの時代よりも\n ずっと未来なんだもんな……。:
I see... This place is much farther in the
future compared to my time, it seems...

290880.「だが これで ボクは 破邪舟師のチカラを\n １００パーセント 発揮できる！\:
With this, I can use my full power as a Ship
Shaper! I'll be able to help you out,
<pc>!

290881.「そりゃ よかったぜ！ そうだ。他にも\n お前の地元に メラゾ熱に苦しんでるヤ:
That's great! Now then, I'm sure you have
others where you live that are suffering from
the fever too. You should bring them all here!

290883.「……くわしいことは 言えないが\n あなたと ハルッカが研究していた\n 破邪:
I can't get into the specifics, but I need
that recipe you and Haruka were working on
to strengthen the Sacred Ship.

290884.「いきなり こんなことを 頼まれて\n 信用できないのは 百も承知だ。\n でも:
I understand that it's hard to trust a
stranger that asks this out of nowhere, but...

290885.「いいぜ。持ってきな。\n ……おい リリオル！:
Fine. You can have it.
Hey, Lyriol!

290886.「いいのか？\n そんな 簡単に ボクたちを信じて……。: Are you sure? You can trust us that easily...?

290887.「お前たちは 命の恩人だ。\n ……それだけで 十分じゃねえか。:
You saved my life. Isn't that enough for me to
trust you?

290888.<pc>は リリオルから\n破邪の紋章のレシピ（だいじなもの）を\n受け取った！:
<pc> received
the Sacred Crest Recipe (Key Item) from
Lyriol!<me 60>

290889.「くわしいことは そのレシピに 書いてある。\n じっくり 読んでおけよ。:
All the details are written there. Make sure
to read them carefully.

290890.「そういえば そろそろ\n うわさの錬金名人さんが 戻ってくるはずね。\n みん:
Speaking of which, the rumored master
alchemist should be back any minute now!
We'll all have some tea!

290891.「まずい！ <pc>！\n 時間切れみたいだ！\n この時代から 弾き出される…:
Shoot, we're out of time!
We're being forced out of the past!

303514.「……失礼。ボクは 破邪舟師エルジュ。\n そこにいる <pc>と ともに\n:
Excuse me... I am the Ship Shaper Erju. I came
here with <pc>, as we are trying
to defeat Netherlord Nergel.

303515.「<pc>には 話したけれど\n ボクは 原因不明の病に冒されている。\n ……:
As I told <pc>, I'm suffering
from an unknown disease. I probably won't
last for much longer...
